entries.meaning: (poker) A bet which is more than standard for a particular situation.
examples: Since the pot was only $10, Julie's $100 bet was certainly an overbet.

verbs.description: overbet (third-person singular simple present overbets, present participle overbetting, simple past and past participle overbet or overbetted)

entries.meaning: (poker) To bet an amount which is more than standard for a particular situation.
examples: Julie overbet by betting $100 into a $10 pot.
